system:

create {../interface/ev_pnd_start_action_sequence.xmlEV_PND_START_ACTION_SEQUENCE} Falsemake_filled
feature -- Access
f_force_extend../interface/ev_pnd_start_action_sequence.xml#f_force_extendforce_extend (action: FalsePROCEDURE) obsolete "Use `extend' instead and provide the right type of agent. [2017-05-31]" -- Extend without type checking. do Falseextend (agent ../interface/ev_pnd_start_action_sequence.xml#f_wrapperwrapper (?, ?, action)) end
f_wrapper../interface/ev_pnd_start_action_sequence.xml#f_wrapperwrapper (a_x: FalseINTEGER_32; a_y: FalseINTEGER_32; action: FalsePROCEDURE) obsolete "Call `action' directly instead. [2017-05-31]" -- Use this to circumvent tuple type checking. (at your own risk!) -- Calls action passing all other arguments. do action.Falsecall ([a_x, a_y]) end

f_new_filled_list../interface/ev_pnd_start_action_sequence.xml#f_new_filled_listnew_filled_list (n: FalseINTEGER_32): like Current -- New list with n elements. do create Result.Falsemake_filled (n) end
